title: CDSL announces uniform tariff of Rs 3.50 per transaction effective October 1st
description: Central Depository Services (India) Limited (CDSL) has announced a uniform tariff of Rs 3.50 per debit transaction, effective from October 1, 2024. This move aims to streamline costs for over 13 crore investors. Discounts of Rs 0.25 will continue for female demat account holders and transactions related to Mutual Fund and Bond ISINs.
